titleStmt.title: The speech of Sr. Edw. Turnor, Kt., speaker of the honourable House of Commons, to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty on Monday the eleventh day of April 1670, upon the adjournment of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Turnor, Edward, Sir, 1617-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe, for Robert Pawlet ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
